CustomField.formula: CASE ( Reason__c , 'Cash Transfer','A42', 'Data Entry Error','A08', 'Duplicate Billing','A52', 'CWC Recovery','A21', 'Unable to supply consignment note copy','A51', 'Consignment note Transfer','C44', 'Prepaids Additional Prepaid Weight','S27', 'Invalid Original Billing Details','A24', 'Manual Connote Surcharge','S01', 'Incorrect Pricing','S30', 'Incorrect Handrate / Missed Quote','S17', 'Miscellaneous Charge','A99', 'Incorrect Cube Data','C06', 'Cubic Negotiated Settlement','C04', 'Incorrect Weight (Customer)','C11', 'Incorrect service','C40', 'Incorrect Origin/Destination','C19', 'Second Delivery Charge','S02', 'Returns Charge','O54', 'Late Delivery Claim','O23', 'Performance Failure (Fleet)','O59', 'Consignment Raised not Sent','C15', 'CCM ExGratia','S22', 'CCM Late Delivery Claim','S50', 'CCM Damages','S07', 'Cubic Leopard scan','O60', 'Incorrect Cubic Data(Operations)','O06', 'Incorrect Cubic Data(Customer)','C06', 'Cubic Negotiated Settlement','O04', 'Incorrect Weight (Operations)','O11', 'Product Return (Commercial)','C24', 'Product Return (Customer)','C50', 'Write Off','A22', 'Small Debt Write Off','A50', 'Bad Debt Write Off','A60', 'Additional Charges','A23', 'Fee Refund Applied','A80', 'CHQ Handling Fee Reversal','A81', 'Un-manifested Fee Refund','A83', 'Manifest Correction Fee Credit','A82', ' ')
CustomField.label: PeopleSoft Reason Code
